text: Mohammed Dauda (born 20 February 1998) is a Ghanaian professional footballer who currently plays as a forward for Belgian club Anderlecht.EfB lejer offensivspiller i Anderlecht, efb.dk, 29 August 2019 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1998 births Category:Living people Category:Ghanaian footballers Category:Ghana under-20 international footballers Category:Asante Kotoko SC players Category:R.S.C. title: Dauda Mohammed
